content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining Station at Position(37.0, -85.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at Position(37.0, -85.0)
- Wooden chest at Position(36.5, -86.5) containing 15 coal

### Iron/Copper Ore Mining and Smelting Complex at Position(-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at Position(-28.0, -61.0) mining copper and iron ore
- Wooden chest at Position(-27.5, -59.5) containing 64 iron ore and 160 copper ore
- Stone furnace at Position(-27.0, -58.0)
- Burner inserter at Position(-26.5, -59.5) moving items from chest to furnace
- Burner inserter at Position(-25.5, -58.5) moving items from furnace to output chest
- Output chest at Position(-24.5, -58.5) containing 95 iron plates and 342 copper plates

### Iron Ore Mining Complex at Position(-10.0, -59.0)
Consists of:
- Three burner mining drills at Positions(-10.0, -59.0), (-8.0, -59.0), (-6.0, -59.0)
- Multiple wooden chests at Positions(-9.5, -57.5), (-7.5, -57.5), (-5.5, -57.5) containing iron ore
- Transport belt system connecting the drills
- Multiple burner inserters moving items between entities

### Smelting Line at Position(0.0, 0.0)
Consists of:
- Four stone furnaces at Positions(0.0, 0.0), (2.0, 0.0), (4.0, 0.0), (6.0, 0.0)
- Input chests at Positions(0.5, -2.5), (2.5, -2.5), (4.5, -2.5), (6.5, -2.5)
- Output chests at Positions(0.5, 2.5), (2.5, 2.5), (4.5, 2.5), (6.5, 2.5)
- Multiple burner inserters moving items between chests and furnaces

### Power Generation System at Position(4.5, 20.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at Position(4.5, 20.5)
- Boiler at Position(-1.5, 22.0)
- Offshore pump at Position(-3.5, 27.5)
- Pipe network connecting these components
- Electric poles at Positions(7.5, 20.5) and (11.5, 20.5)

ERROR TIPS

### Fuel Management Issues
- Multiple burner mining drills and inserters are out of fuel
- Always ensure mining drills and inserters have coal in their fuel inventory before they run out

### Fluid Connection Problems
- Steam engine shows "no input liquid" and "no fluid present in connections"
- Ensure proper pipe connections between boiler and steam engine
- Check that the fluid system is properly connected end-to-end

### Entity Placement and Space Issues
- Some inserters show "output blocked by item on ground"
- Ensure there is proper space for inserters to drop items
- Make sure destination entities are properly placed within inserter reach

### Power Distribution Issues
- Lab shows "NO_POWER" status
- Verify electrical pole connections form a complete network
- Ensure power generation is working and connected to consumers
